The US Supreme Court hands Trump a sweeping victory by limiting the power of federal judges
description: The high court has restricted the use of nationwide injunctions issued by federal judges. As a result, it leaves in effect the presidential order limiting jus soli (birthright citizenship) in the 28 states that had not challenged it in court.

Serge Hefez, psychiatrist: 'Our children are too alone in front of screens'
description: The teenager who stabbed a school supervisor in eastern France in June had no history of mental health problems and later showed no remorse. Psychoanalyst Serge Hefez draws a link between the growing lack of empathy he has observed in his patients and their ever-increasing screen time.

headline: Serbian riot police fire tear gas at anti-government protesters demanding an early election
description: The major rally in Belgrade against Serbia's populist president, Aleksandar Vucic, was called to back a demand for an early parliamentary election, which Vucic and his party have repeatedly refused, accusing protesters of planning to spur violence on orders from abroad.

headline: Paris's Iranian diaspora debates war, mullahs and 'what comes next' at city bookshop
description: After Israel's and then America's airstrikes on Iran, the Iranian editor and theater director Tinouche Nazmjou launched a series of discussions at his bookshop in the 15th arrondissement.
